hint: Focus on pushing filters into CTEs and applying early reduction to dimension tables before joining to the fact table, using materialization to avoid recomputation.
Isolate filtered dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining with store_sales, enabling predicate pushdown and better join optimization across all dimensions.
Pre-filter multiple dimensions, then pre-join with fact table in staged CTEs before final aggregation, consolidating scans into single-pass operations where possible.
Transform OR conditions into UNION ALL branches to enable separate optimization paths, then restructure using CTE splitting and decorrelation techniques for maximal plan flexibility.
